word_mean: 反社会的：意指(i)行为侵犯其他人权利或犯罪的
(ii)具有一种特殊人格综合征，即反社会型人格异常(antisocial personality disorder)的，据认为许多反社会行为与此有关。见personality项下

sentence.Network_en: Toddlers are notoriously antisocial when it comes to sharing toys.
sentence.Network_cn: 众所周知，刚学会走路的孩子不愿和别人分享玩具。

sentence.Network_en: They'll think you're being antisocial if you don't go.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是你不去，他们就会认为你不合群。

sentence.Network_en: It is antisocial to leave one's litter in public place.
sentence.Network_cn: 在公共场所遗弃杂物是妨害公共利益的.

entry.tran: 不爱交际的；孤僻的；不合群的
entry.def: Someone who is anti-social is unwilling to meet and be friendly with other people.

example.ex: ...teenagers who will become aggressive and anti-social.
example.tran: 将会变得好斗、孤僻的青少年一代

entry.tran: （行为）反社会的，危害社会的，令人讨厌的
entry.def: Anti-social behaviour is annoying or upsetting to other people.

example.ex: Playing these games can lead to anti-social behaviour.
example.tran: 玩这类游戏会引发反社会行为。

means.word_mean: 2. unwilling or unable to conform to normal standards of social behavior;

sentences.sentence: "criminal behavior or conduct that violates the rights of other individuals is antisocial"
